title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Output-Oriented Teaching Competency Development Program for Training Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and foundational educational theories
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can develop at least three mathematics lesson modules based on instructional design principles
Learners can improve their instructional execution skills by at least 80% through peer evaluation and data analysis
Learners can systematically analyze instructional execution processes and propose improvement strategies through reflective journaling
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
